skins.shipDescription: Essex-class aircraft carrier C Intrepid, Hull Number CV-11.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the third ship of the Essex class, Intrepid! Although my poor luck during the war earned me quite a few unflattering nicknames... Heheh, that's all behind me now! Commander, under your command, I'll show you just how powerful I am!
skins.acquisition: "The Fighting I" of the Essex-class, Intrepid, is here! Commander, leave the combat missions to me! I'll bring home victory and glory!
skins.login: Am I slated to sortie today? If not, hurry up and fix that!
skins.details: One should always go all out, no matter the enemy... Having that said, there are various practical reasons why that isn't always possible...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, do you like stargazing? Ahaha, it's fine if you aren't really into astronomy. If you're ever interested, just let me know.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Submarines are... quite strong. But I think I might be able to go toe-to-toe with them.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Despite the fact that there are many Essex-class carriers, we all have our good spots, you say? ...Uhh, you're not talking about our ship performance? I've never given much thought to those bothersome things...
skins.secretaryTouch: Want something to drink? Then, how about a martini C shaken, not stirred? Just kidding!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You... *sigh*...I'm way more inclined to beat you to a pulp than to praise you for your bravery.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Wooahh?! You're messing up my hair?!

skins.shipDescription: There's been a lot of inter-port meets recently... But before I can join a team with my other Eagle Union colleagues, I've got to up my game first! So, Commander, mind training with me?
skins.acquisition: There's been a lot of inter-port meets recently... But before I can join a team with my other Eagle Union colleagues, I've got to up my game first! So, Commander, mind training with me?
skins.login: It's not enough to just be a pitcher. I've gotta be a good batter as well! Oh, Bluegill's also out there training. Let's grab her for our practice!
skins.details: Nice catch! You've got skill! How about becoming my catcher?
skins.secretaryIdle1: A ponytail really does get in the way, huh... Next time, maybe I'll try putting it up...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Gah! I threw the ball full power and lost control of it... My bad, my bad!
skins.secretaryIdle3: All righty! This one's headed towards the ends of the universe! Wait, how's the catcher gonna get it then...
skins.secretaryTouch: Woah! I just thought of a new kind of pitch! Commander, let's go try it out!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Even if you brought protection, getting hit by my fastball is gonna hurt like hell~
